body_html:
I found this to be a very good guide when I was building from source: http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/
The guide is for TF1.4 and CUDA9.1 but equally applies with TF1.5 or other combinations; just make sure to specify the correct files and version numbers. Cheers.

The guide is for TF1.4 and CUDA9.1 but equally applies with TF1.5 or other combinations; just make sure to specify the correct files and version numbers. Cheers.
